solution_line_template: Riley has {riley_fewer} fewer pairs of shoes than Ellie’s {ellie_pairs}, so {ellie_pairs} – {riley_fewer} = <<{ellie_pairs}-{riley_fewer}={riley_pairs}>>{riley_pairs} pairs of shoes.
Together, they have Ellie’s {ellie_pairs} + Riley’s {riley_pairs} = <<{ellie_pairs}+{riley_pairs}={total_pairs}>>{total_pairs} pairs of shoes.
